content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Haoyu. It's nice to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment in Duisburg to be quite attractive. So, what price were you considering for the monthly rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, could you please tell me what is your initial price for the monthly rent? I want to make sure we are on the same page before we start negotiating.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: As a landlord, I prefer to let the market set the price. However, I'm open to considering a fair offer that reflects the value of my property. What price did you have in mind?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, I understand that the market price is important. However, I am a student and I am on a tight budget. I was thinking of an initial price of 400 Euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 400 Euros per month is a very generous offer, considering the current market conditions. However, I must be honest with you. My apartment is brand new, fully equipped with modern amenities, and located in the heart of the city center. I believe such a prime location and the quality of the apartment warrant a higher price. How does 500 Euros per month sound to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, I appreciate your honesty. However, as a student, I have to manage my expenses carefully. 450 Euros per month would be a more reasonable price for me.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand your situation, Haoyu. As a landlord, I'm willing to make some concessions for a tenant who will appreciate and take care of my property. 450 Euros per month is an acceptable price, considering your circumstances. I believe it's a fair compromise. Shall we proceed with the lease at this price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [450] Euro!
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Excellent! I'm glad we could reach an agreement that satisfies both parties. I look forward to having you as a tenant. Let's proceed with the lease at 450 Euros per month. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
